name: verify-unplanned-incident-details-in-text-view-traffic-hazard-page;issue-lt-396a-text-view-regression-browser-chrome-context-chrome-feature-lt25-text-view-lt-396-current-and-future-incident-list-capability-lt-25-text-view

tags.name: LT 25 Text View/LT-396 Current and Future incident list

title: Verify Unplanned incident details in text view Traffic Hazard page

userStory.storyName: LT-396 Current and Future incident list

testSteps.description: Given I am at the LiveTraffic Website
Then I click on the menu button
Then I click "List View" button from the menu list
Then I should see "All incident types" filter is turned off by default
When I turn "on" All incident type filter
And I turn "off" All incident type filter
Then I should see incident name as "Roselands" and incident location as "King Georges Road at Roselands Dr"
Then I should see incident type as "BREAKDOWN Truck" and incident region as "Sydney Inner"

Then I should see below incident details
| Title_Name | Info |
| Date & Time | Started 4 February, 2020 11:21am, Last checked 4 February, 2020 11:40am |
| Impact | 1 of 3 southbound lanes closed |
| Impact | (lane 1). |
| Attending | Emergency services |
| Attending | Mechanic |
| Advice | Exercise caution |
| Advice | Reduce your speed |
And I should see "View on Map" button in the incident details section
When I click "View on Map" button
Then I should see Incident display name as "King Georges Road at Roselands Dr"
